snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers rallied for a wild 101-99 victory over the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday to even their best-of-seven Western Conference semi-final at 2-2....

headline.print_headline: Clippers Rally Late to Stun Thunder, Tie Series
headline.main: Clippers Rally Late to Stun Thunder, Tie Series

lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers rallied for a wild 101-99 victory over the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday to even their best-of-seven Western Conference semi-final at 2-2.
